ModMetaData.name: GFL Weapons
ModMetaData.author: AIvanCP
ModMetaData.description:
Adds 7 unique weapons from Girls' Frontline with special abilities and status effects.
1. SUOMI SMG - Frost control with shields and terrain 2. MOSIN-NAGANT - Electric sniper with conductivity 3. AGLAEA - Tactical AI with auto-turrets and buffs 4. TRAILBLAZER - Fire shotgun with burn stacking 5. HESTIA (CZ75) - Momentum pistol with Rend/Gash combo 6. SKYLLA - Corrosive AR with chain explosions 7. RADIANCE - Hydro support sniper with follower summon
All weapons are player-only and obtained through trading, quests, or crafting (Gas Operation research required).
KEY FEATURES: - 14 unique abilities (2 per weapon) - 20+ status effects (buffs/debuffs) - Elemental damage types (Frost, Electric, Fire, Corrosion, Hydro) - Chain reaction mechanics - Summoning system (turrets, followers) - Compatible with vanilla and Combat Extended
